Ranged Stance

Requirement: A ranged weapon.

With an eye toward higher ground, you grab your ranged weapon and prepare to climb—from above, you’ll be able to both see and control the battlefield, delivering death from above.

Pros

Death from Above

  • While at least 5ft elevated from your target, your attacks gain +1 to hit, deal +1 damage, and have +10ft range.
  • Gain this bonus again at 15ft, 30ft, 45ft, and 60ft elevated, to a maximum bonus of +5 and +50ft.
  • While flying or hovering, this bonus caps at +2 and +20ft.

Overwatch

  • You have advantage on readied attacks against moving targets.

Cons

Fox Hole

  • Creatures with cover against your attacks treat:
    • Three Quarters Cover as Full Cover.
    • Half Cover as Three Quarters Cover.
